parameters.command: =cd /d {{ $('Set: config').item.json.working_directory }} && echo. | claude -p "{{ $('Set: config').item.json.command_agent1 }} {{ $('Set: arguments').item.json.arguments }}" --dangerously-skip-permissions < NUL
=cd /d {{ $('Set: config').item.json.working_directory }} && echo. | claude -p "{{ $('Set: config').item.json.command_agent2 }} specs/{{ $json.analysis_file }}" --dangerously-skip-permissions < NUL

=cd /d {{ $('Set: config').item.json.working_directory }} && echo. | claude -p "{{ $('Set: config').item.json.command_agent3 }} {{ $('Set: config').item.json.workflow_id }}" --dangerously-skip-permissions < NUL

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "status": "success", "message": "Workflow analysis and fix completed", "workflow_id": $('Set: config').item.json.workflow_id, "operations": $('Execute: adw:implement-fix').item.json } }}
